prompt.task: Validate the project milestones and deliverables in the Statement of Work (SoW).
prompt.instructions: 1. Check if milestones and deliverables are clearly defined. 2. Validate the timeline feasibility. 3. Flag any vague or unrealistic expectations.
prompt.output: Milestone Validation: [Valid/Invalid] Unrealistic Timelines: [List of unrealistic timelines] Missing Deliverables: [List of missing deliverables] Recommendations: [Suggested improvements]
